message: This is a fair and generous offer, Bob. Take it or risk losing more in the next round!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bigger share. This is my best offer.
This is my final offer, Bob. We're both losing money with each passing round. Let's settle this fairly before it's too late.
I'm not going to give in yet. I'll give you a slightly better offer, but don't think this is the end of it.
